text: Jóhann Gunnar Sigurðsson (2 February 1882 - 20 May 1906) was an Icelandic poet. Sigurðsson was a new New Romantic-style writer. He was born in Reykjavík. He studied at the Menntaskólinn í Reykjavík until 1903. In November 1905, Sigurðsson became sick and was hospitalized. He died on 20 May 1906, aged 24, in Reykjavík. ==References== Category:1882 births Category:1906 deaths Johann Gunnar Sigurdsson Johann Gunnar Sigurdsson
title: Jóhann Gunnar Sigurðsson
